name: Pixel Creature
description:
Background:

Pixel Creature is a game where player creates creatures, which can eat, mate and evolve!

Each creature has its own DNA, defining their shapes and how they move around. Once two creatures create a child. That child will inherit parts of the DNA from its parents.

Over time, creatures adapt to the change of environment, generating interesting behaviours and shapes.

Gameplay:

The screen is split into two: Crafting Table and Map.

One the left side of the screen, player uses Crafting Table to create creatures. Three types of creature can be created: Green, Yellow & Red. Player can click on the Green, Yellow or Red square to select which type of creature to create.

Red creature only eats Yellow creature. Yellow creature only eats Green creature. Green creature only eats tiny green squares.

All creatures will die eventually and release tiny green squares, which can be eaten by Green creature.

Goal:

The goal is to generate as many Yellow creatures as possible. Each time, a yellow pixel is generated, the score increases by one. (Yellow creature consists of yellow pixels).

(Green or Red creatures can also evolve to have Yellow pixels with a small chance through mutation. The Yellow pixels on non-Yellow creature will also increase the score!)
